page.title: 07Blakedown Ghosts
page.content: There are two ghosts which are well-known around{Blakedown.}One is the ghost of{Cut-Throat Lane}and the other is the ghost of{Ladies Pool.} A boy was said to have been walking along{Cut-Throat Lane}when he saw a hand with a knife move across and down. The strange thing was that the hand was unattached. After he had rounded the next corner where he had seen the hand, there was a dead body sprawled across the ground. The body had had its throat cut. Two old ladies were said to have been walking along the edge of the lake and slipped (some people say pushed),fell in and drowned. The lake is now called {Ladies Pool.}
